attributes.additional_details:
The market has been disrupted for the last 3 - 4 months and it seems sensible there is an extension the help to buy.
Rethinking the regional cap would also help as new house prices do not cost what is being suggested.
attributes.background:
Extend the Help to buy equity loan as new building work had to be paused and will not be completed in time as.
The new builds costs do not match the new regional price cap. This helps no first time buyers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331592
